title: Tammy Hembrow debuts NECK tattoo while adding to her extensive collection of body art
text:
Tammy Hembrow has added a neck tattoo to her extensive collection of body art.

The inked-up Instagram influencer shared a glimpse at a large star tattooed below her right ear to her 9,973,000 adoring followers on Saturday afternoon.

'Spot the new tatt,' teased Tammy on Saturday while offering a peek at the star in a busty selfie-style video while riding in a car.

In the clip, Tammy is seen pouting for the camera in a plunging PVC top that barely contained her bust.

She then turned her head slightly and pulled back her ponytail to debut the bold black design.

It's unclear whether the design holds any particular symbolic meaning for the social media sensation, who is fast approaching 10 million followers on Instagram.

'Spot the new tatt': Tammy Hembrow added a neck tattoo of a bold star (circled) below her right ear to her extensive collection of body art on Saturday

Growing collection! In June, Tammy had a butterfly tattooed (circle, centre) onto her left forearm, above what looks to be a small sea horse (circle, left) on her left hip

Strength: In January, Tammy revealed that she'd had a pair of angel wings tattooed on her back to represent all the 'hard times' she'd been through in recent years

Earlier this year, Tammy debuted a butterfly on her forearm inspired by a rock song and pair of wings on her back to represent the 'hard times' she has overcome.

'You're my butterfly, sugar baby,' she cryptically captioned a mirror selfie photo flaunting the design, referencing hit song Butterfly by Crazy Town.

Above this, Tammy recently had a large tattoo of a palm tree inked on her arm.

That's huge! Tammy also has a tattoo of what looks like a large rose on her back

Inked-up influencer! Tammy has a large tattoo of a palm tree (circled) on her left arm too

In January, Tammy revealed that she'd had a pair of angel wings tattooed on her back to represent all the 'hard times' she'd been through in recent years.

'It was a lot to go through and this was my symbol for strength... and to represent my faith,' she said, referencing her split from Reece Hawkins in 2018.

Tammy also has a tattoo of what looks like a large rose on her back.

Completing her collection of body art is a set of roman numerals under her right breast, and what looks like a sea horse on her left thigh.

Tammy also has her daughter Saski's name tattooed on her arm.

Sweet tribute! Tammy also has her daughter Saski's name (circle) tattooed on her right arm
description: Tammy Hembrow has added a neck tattoo to her extensive collection of body art.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
